mas.jobproxy

Class job

  • java.lang.Object
    • mas.jobproxy.job
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class job
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a manufacturing shop floor job There is no need to explicitly set start time of job. Start time of job will be set whenever we set start time of current operation Start time of job will just be the start time of it's first operation Similarly finish time of job is set
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
